verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Also <S%H1121><s%>, you son of man <S%H120><s%>, thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%> unto the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; A end <S%H7093><s%>, the end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> upon the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H3671><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

Now is the end <S%H7093><s%> come upon you <S%H7971><s%>, and I will send my anger <S%H639><s%> upon you <S%H8199><s%>, and will judge you according to your ways <S%H1870><s%>, and will recompense <S%H5414><s%> upon you all your abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

And my eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare <S%H2347><s%> you <S%H2550><s%>, neither will I have pity: but I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> upon you <S%H8441><s%>, and your abominations shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H3045><s%>: and you shall know that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; A evil <S%H7451><s%>, a only <S%H259><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>, behold <S%H935><s%>, is come.
A end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, the end <S%H7093><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>: it watches <S%H6974><s%> for you <S%H935><s%>; behold, it is come.

The morning <S%H6843><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> unto you <S%H3427><s%>, O you that dwell in the land <S%H776><s%>: the time <S%H6256><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H4103><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%>, and not the sounding again <S%H1906><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.

Now will I shortly <S%H7138><s%> pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon you <S%H3615><s%>, and accomplish my anger <S%H639><s%> upon you <S%H8199><s%>: and I will judge you according to your ways <S%H1870><s%>, and will recompense <S%H5414><s%> you for all your abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

And my eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare <S%H2347><s%>, neither will I have pity <S%H2550><s%>: I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> you according to your ways <S%H1870><s%> and your abominations <S%H8441><s%> that are in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H3045><s%>; and you shall know that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that strikes <S%H5221><s%>.

Behold the day <S%H3117><s%>, behold <S%H935><s%>, it is come: the morning <S%H6843><s%> is gone forth <S%H3318><s%>; the rod <S%H4294><s%> has blossomed <S%H6692><s%>, pride <S%H2087><s%> has budded <S%H6524><s%>.

Violence <S%H2555><s%> is risen up <S%H6965><s%> into a rod <S%H4294><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%>: none of them shall remain <S%H1995><s%>, nor of their multitude, nor of any <S%H1991><s%> of theirs <S%H5089><s%>: neither shall there be wailing for them.

The time <S%H6256><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, the day <S%H3117><s%> draws near <S%H5060><s%>: let not the buyer <S%H7069><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, nor the seller <S%H4376><s%> mourn <S%H56><s%>: for wrath <S%H2740><s%> is upon all the multitude there <S%H1995><s%>.

For the seller <S%H4376><s%> shall not return <S%H7725><s%> to that which is sold <S%H4465><s%>, although they were yet alive <S%H2416><s%>: for the vision <S%H2377><s%> is touching the whole multitude <S%H1995><s%> there <S%H7725><s%>, which shall not return; neither shall any <S%H376><s%> strengthen <S%H2388><s%> himself in the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his life <S%H2416><s%>.

They have blown <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H8619><s%>, even to make all ready <S%H3559><s%>; but none goes <S%H1980><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%>: for my wrath <S%H2740><s%> is upon all the multitude there <S%H1995><s%>.

The sword <S%H2719><s%> is outside <S%H2351><s%>, and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> inside <S%H1004><s%>: he that is in the field <S%H7704><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and he that is in the city <S%H5892><s%>, famine <S%H7458><s%> and pestilence <S%H1698><s%> shall devour him <S%H398><s%>.

But they that escape <S%H6403><s%> of them shall escape <S%H6412><s%>, and shall be on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> like doves <S%H3123><s%> of the valleys <S%H1516><s%>, all of them mourning <S%H1993><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> for his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
All hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be feeble <S%H7503><s%>, and all knees <S%H1290><s%> shall be weak <S%H3212><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>.

They shall also clothe <S%H2296><s%> themselves with sackcloth <S%H8242><s%>, and horror <S%H6427><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> them <S%H955><s%>; and shame shall be upon all faces <S%H6440><s%>, and baldness <S%H7144><s%> upon all their heads <S%H7218><s%>.

They shall cast <S%H7993><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> in the streets <S%H2351><s%>, and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall be removed <S%H5079><s%>: their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall not be able <S%H3201><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the wrath <S%H5678><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: they shall not satisfy <S%H7646><s%> their souls <S%H5315><s%>, neither fill <S%H4390><s%> their bowels <S%H4578><s%>: because it is the stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

As for the beauty <S%H6643><s%> of his ornament <S%H5716><s%>, he set <S%H7760><s%> it in majesty <S%H1347><s%>: but they made <S%H6213><s%> the images <S%H6754><s%> of their abominations <S%H8441><s%> and of their detestable things <S%H8251><s%> in it <S%H5414><s%>: therefore have I set it far from them <S%H5079><s%>.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the strangers <S%H2114><s%> for a prey <S%H957><s%>, and to the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for a plunder <S%H7998><s%>; and they shall pollute it <S%H2490><s%>.

My face <S%H6440><s%> will I turn <S%H5437><s%> also from them <S%H2490><s%>, and they shall pollute my secret <S%H6845><s%> place <S%H6530><s%>: for the robbers shall enter <S%H935><s%> into it <S%H2490><s%>, and defile it.

Make <S%H6213><s%> a chain <S%H7569><s%>: for the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bloody <S%H1818><s%> crimes <S%H4941><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%>.

Therefore I will bring <S%H935><s%> the worst <S%H7451><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%>: I will also make the pomp <S%H1347><s%> of the strong <S%H5794><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>; and their holy places <S%H6942><s%> shall be defiled <S%H2490><s%>.
Destruction <S%H7089><s%> comes <S%H935><s%>; and they shall seek <S%H1245><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>, and there shall be none.

Mischief <S%H1943><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon mischief <S%H1943><s%>, and rumour <S%H8052><s%> shall be upon rumour <S%H8052><s%>; then shall they seek <S%H1245><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%>; but the law <S%H8451><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%> from the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and counsel <S%H6098><s%> from the ancients <S%H2205><s%>.

The king <S%H4428><s%> shall mourn <S%H56><s%>, and the prince <S%H5387><s%> shall be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with desolation <S%H8077><s%>, and the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall be troubled <S%H926><s%>: I will do <S%H6213><s%> unto them after their way <S%H1870><s%>, and according to their deserts <S%H4941><s%> will I judge <S%H8199><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>; and they shall know that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
